participant_1.background:
I care more about my children than social media.
I'm not rich, but I enjoy traveling with my dog.
My social media life is pretty low-key, because I'm more focused on my studies.
i am deathly terrified of heights.
I enjoy trying new foods, but my favorite dishes are usually simple and comforting.

participant_2.background:
I love to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music.
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I'm not too concerned with social media, I'd rather focus on my writing.
I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets.
I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss.

content.text: What is your favorite way to express yourself?
I love to express myself through my costumes and love the energy of live music.
That's really cool! Do you make your own costumes?
I do, whenever I can! I also love to dance and sing.
Me too! I used to perform in dance recitals when I was younger.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to take dance lessons, but I'm not very coordinated.
It's never too late to start! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Maybe I'll look into it! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! What's your favorite kind of music?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm especially a fan of rock and roll.
Me too! I love the energy of live music.
It's the best! I've been to a few concerts this year and they were all amazing.
Me too! I went to a concert last weekend and it was so much fun.
I'm glad you had a good time! I'm looking forward to my next concert.
Me too! I hope it's soon.
